{{Use dmy dates|date=November 2017}} {{Infobox football biography | name=Sylvain Deslandes | fullname=Sylvain Boris Nabil Deslandes{{cite web|title=Retained List 2015-16|url=http://www.efl.com/documents/professional-retained-report-2015-16549-3151378.pdf|publisher=English Football League|format=PDF|accessdate=26 June 2016|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161202052144/http://www.efl.com/documents/professional-retained-report-2015-16549-3151378.pdf|archivedate=2 December 2016|df=dmy-all}} | birth_date={{birth date and age|1997|4|25|df=y}} | birth_place=[[Kouoptamo]], Cameroon | height= 1.86m | position=[[Defender (association football)|Center back]] | currentclub=[[FC Jumilla]]
(on loan from [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]]) | clubnumber= | youthclubs1=AM. S. Soliers | youthclubs2=[[USON Mondeville]] | youthyears1=2007–2008 | youthyears2=2008–2010 | clubs1=[[Stade Malherbe Caen|Caen II]] | clubs2=[[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]] | clubs3=→ [[Bury F.C.|Bury]] (loan) | clubs4=→ [[Portsmouth F.C.|Portsmouth]] (loan) | clubs5=→ [[FC Jumilla]] (Loan) | years1=2013–2015 | years2=2015– | years3=2017 | years4=2018 | years5=2018– | caps1=8 | caps2=4 | caps3=0 | caps4=2 | caps5=4 | goals1=1 | goals2=0 | goals3=0 | goals4=0 | goals5=0 | nationalteam1 = [[France national under-16 football team|France U16]] | nationalteam2 = [[France national under-17 football team|France U17]] | nationalyears1 = 2013 | nationalyears2 = 2013–2014 | nationalcaps1 = 1 | nationalcaps2 = 7 | nationalgoals1 = 0 | nationalgoals2 = 0 | club-update=24 September 2018 | youthyears3=2010–2015 | youthclubs3=[[Stade Malherbe Caen|Caen]] | nationalyears3 = 2014 | nationalteam3 = [[France national under-18 football team|France U18]] | nationalcaps3 = 3 | nationalgoals3 = 0 | nationalteam4 = [[France national under-19 football team|France U19]] | nationalyears4 = 2016 | nationalcaps4 = 3 | nationalgoals4 = 0 | nationalteam5 = [[France national under-20 football team|France U20]] | nationalyears5 = 2016– | nationalcaps5 = 1 | nationalgoals5 = 0 }} '''Sylvain Boris Nabil Deslandes''' (born 25 April 1997) is a professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays as a [[Defender (association football)|defender]] for [[Segunda División B]] club [[FC Jumilla]] on loan from English club [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]]. He has represented France at under-16 through under-20 level. ==Career== Deslandes moved upon the expiry of his contract with French club [[Stade Malherbe Caen|Caen]] to join English side [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]] in July 2015, agreeing a two-year deal (with the option of a third year).{{cite news| title=Deslandes set to sign| publisher=Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C| url=http://www.wolves.co.uk/news/article/deslandes-set-to-sign-2487827.aspx| date=10 June 2015| deadurl=yes| archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150906133926/http://www.wolves.co.uk/news/article/deslandes-set-to-sign-2487827.aspx| archivedate=6 September 2015| df=dmy-all}} He made his club debut on 25 August 2015 in a League Cup win over [[Barnet F.C.|Barnet]].{{cite news| title=Wolves 2–1 Barnet|publisher=BBC Sport| url=https://www.bbc.com/sport/0/football/33969991| date=25 August 2015}} On 31 January 2017, he joined [[Bury F.C.|Bury]] on loan until the end of the season.{{cite web|url=http://www.buryfc.co.uk/news/article/2016-17/confirmed-left-back-deslandes-arrives-from-wolves-3548768.aspx|title=Confirmed: Left Back Deslandes arrives from Wolves|publisher=Bury F.C.|date=31 January 2017}} He returned to Wolves at the end of the 2016/17 season having made no appearances for Bury. He appeared regularly under [[Nuno Espirito Santo]] in 2017-2018 pre-season and played 90 minutes in the 2-0 [[Carabao Cup]] win against [[Premier League]] side [[Southampton FC]]. {{cite web|url=https://www.expressandstar.com/sport/football/wolverhampton-wanderers-fc/2017/09/19/wolves-defender-deslandes-loving-being-in-land-of-sylvain/}} He also came on during Wolves 2-1 [[Championship]] victory against [[Nottingham Forest]] on September 2017.{{cite web|url=https://www.expressandstar.com/sport/football/wolverhampton-wanderers-fc/2017/09/19/wolves-defender-deslandes-loving-being-in-land-of-sylvain/}} On 3 January 2018, he agreed to join [[Portsmouth F.C|Portsmouth]] as a [[left-back]] on loan until the end of the season.{{cite web|url=https://www.wolves.co.uk/news/first-team/20180102-ronan-and-deslandes-leave-on-loan/|title=Ronan And Deslandes Leave On Loan|publisher=Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|date=3 January 2018}} He returned to Wolves at the end of the season having made only two appearances for [[Portsmouth FC]], after manager [[Kenny Jackett]] says his future was not at [[left-back]] but [[centre-back]] as Sylvain is a player with "power" and "athleticism".{{cite web|url=https://www.portsmouth.co.uk/sport/football/pompey/pompey-boss-deslandes-future-not-at-left-back-1-8491835}} ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {{Updated|match played 9 September 2018}} {|
